statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 100;
SELECT route_id, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE time_estimate > 30;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT vehicle_id, distance, time_estimate FROM delivery_routes WHERE end_location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, time_estimate FROM delivery_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY time_estimate ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance < 50 AND time_estimate < 30;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location LIKE 'New%' OR end_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY start_location ASC, distance DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id, COUNT(route_id) AS total_routes FROM delivery_routes GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(route_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, route_distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT point_name, point_address, point_latitude, point_longitude FROM delivery_points WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT route_id, route_distance, route_duration FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM delivery_points WHERE point_name LIKE '%central%' ORDER BY point_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_distance, route_duration FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT point_name, point_address, point_latitude, point_longitude FROM delivery_points WHERE point_id = 5;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS point_count FROM delivery_points GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes JOIN delivery_points ON delivery_routes.route_id = delivery_points.route_id WHERE delivery_points.point_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM fleet;
SELECT vehicle_name, total_capacity FROM fleet WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM fleet ORDER BY total_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_miles > 100 AND time_hours < 2;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time FROM deliveries WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM fleet WHERE total_capacity > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, total_capacity FROM fleet WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_miles FROM routes WHERE time_hours < 3.5;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time, completed FROM deliveries WHERE completed = true ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT fleet.vehicle_name, deliveries.delivery_time FROM fleet INNER JOIN deliveries ON fleet.vehicle_id = deliveries.vehicle_id WHERE delivery_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY max_speed DESC;
SELECT route_id, distance FROM routes WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT location_lat, location_long FROM stops WHERE address LIKE 'Main%';
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, distance, time_taken FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY time_taken ASC;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, distance, time_taken FROM routes WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2) AND distance < 50;
SELECT * FROM routes JOIN vehicles ON routes.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT route_id, distance, time_taken, vehicle_name FROM routes JOIN vehicles ON routes.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 1000;
SELECT route_id, distance, time_taken FROM routes WHERE time_taken < 5 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_name, max_speed, distance FROM routes JOIN vehicles ON routes.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE max_speed > 50 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT id, origin_location, destination_location FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM vehicle_routes GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM delivery_points WHERE delivery_time > '2021-10-01';
SELECT location_id, AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude FROM locations GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY avg_latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, origin_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT routes.id, vehicles.plate_number, vehicles.model, routes.distance FROM routes JOIN vehicles ON routes.vehicle_id = vehicles.id;
SELECT location_id, route_id, delivery_time, delivery_status FROM delivery_points WHERE delivery_status = 'pending' ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS num_routes FROM vehicle_routes GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING num_routes > 2 ORDER BY num_routes DESC;
